description.narrative: This activity (Skills and Employment in Bangladesh) is a component of Skills and Employment Programme in Bangladesh (Sudokkho) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £14,252,807. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration, Industrial development. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK), Swisscontact. The start date is 13-06-2010 and the end date is 30-10-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
